channel.title: Issues
channel.description:
I need to be able to work out a few things before my server is playable..
Ok first off, spawning npc's to work as shops. YES I have checked guides and following tuts. And i get to the point where the shops are trade able, but then, the items do not show up in the shops. Anyone else have this issue? Maybe with issue #7?
Second, when my beta tester dies, the client freezes. Then when logged back in he is at the re-spawn point. I have looked through alot of files and can't find anything that would be the cause of this problem. Help?
Third, i can't seem to change magic xp rate. I have successfully changed melee/range. Do I need to go to a different file for mage?
Fourth, when attacking somebody and they run, i stay in one place and do not follow. I'm thinking there is a simple fix for that one.
Fifth, I have tried changing the skill req's for dhide, and still it says 60 defence needed. I have went into my defCL and added it and everything still no luck. Might have to do with problem #7?
And sixth, I wish to make the ENTIRE map, or at least as much as possible, wild. I have looked in client.java, and seen some things about PvP coords, and wildy coords. Is this where i change that? And could somebody help me with what order/places, i put in the coords?
Finally seventh, now this one is strange. For example i changed the bank command to "shit" from "bank". And when i compile, and login, the "bank" command works, when i clearly took out "bank". Any ideas on what might be causing some original files/commands to ge referenced when they are not even there? This is the most urgent issue at the moment. It's like the server won't save/compile changes i make.
Thanks to anyone that can help me.
~jAnDa

item.title: Issues
item.dc:creator: @hootywooty hootywooty
item.description:
@hootywooty wrote:

ooo srry about that when i said this code if (playerLevel[6] change the 6 to the requirments of the dhide. So if the requirments were like 70 then swith out the 6 witha 70. Sorry that is my bad i just copyied and pasted right out of my client.java
Hope you understand my mistake

Read full topic

For the bank one, keep searching you probably have 2 commands for bank.

item.title: Issues
item.dc:creator: @jandascape90 jandascape90
item.description:
@jandascape90 wrote:

I need to be able to work out a few things before my server is playable…

Ok first off, spawning npc’s to work as shops. YES I have checked guides and following tuts. And i get to the point where the shops are trade able, but then, the items do not show up in the shops. Anyone else have this issue? Maybe with issue #7?

Second, when my beta tester dies, the client freezes. Then when logged back in he is at the re-spawn point. I have looked through alot of files and can’t find anything that would be the cause of this problem. Help?

Third, i can’t seem to change magic xp rate. I have successfully changed melee/range. Do I need to go to a different file for mage?

Fourth, when attacking somebody and they run, i stay in one place and do not follow. I’m thinking there is a simple fix for that one.

Fifth, I have tried changing the skill req’s for dhide, and still it says 60 defence needed. I have went into my defCL and added it and everything still no luck. Might have to do with problem #7?

And sixth, I wish to make the ENTIRE map, or at least as much as possible, wild. I have looked in client.java, and seen some things about PvP coords, and wildy coords. Is this where i change that? And could somebody help me with what order/places, i put in the coords?

Finally seventh, now this one is strange. For example i changed the bank command to “shit” from “bank”. And when i compile, and login, the “bank” command works, when i clearly took out “bank”. Any ideas on what might be causing some original files/commands to ge referenced when they are not even there? This is the most urgent issue at the moment. It’s like the server won’t save/compile changes i make.

Thanks to anyone that can help me.

~jAnDa
